domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: Frontline
entity.description: "Frontline" offers an unflinching and compelling look at complex, vital and often-controversial subjects. Each broadcast consists of a long-form news documentary. Topics run the gamut -- from Bernie Madoff's intricate fraud and prisoner abuse at Abu Ghraib, to AIDs, racial issues and Wal-Mart's effect on the U.S. economy.

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RepLeeZeldin @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse I’m watching FRONTLINE DOCUMENTARY on Coronavirus. It’s horrible to see that Trump decided to settle a score w/Governors that he doesn’t like by withholding support, putting doctors, nurses & hospital workers in harms way. TRUMPS COLLATERAL DAMAGE. NO LEADERSHIP FROM TRUMP ADMIN!
